title: We're launching Banking coverage to take you beyond the biggest finance headlines from insight to action
text:
The retail and business banking industry is undergoing a rapid and disruptive transformation as a result of emerging technologies, shifting consumer demands, and increased competition. There is a lot at stake — tech giants are poised to grab up to 40% of the $1.35 trillion in US financial services revenue from incumbent banks, per McKinsey.

To help leading retail banking executives, channel strategists, marketers, and analysts stay ahead of this complex and massive shift, Business Insider is launching our newest coverage area, Banking.

Our Banking coverage gives the people moving the industry forward an edge with access to news, expert analysis, and insight from a community of the most important decision-makers shaping the future financial services.

Here's why the industry's leading banks, fintechs, consultancies, and technologies companies turn to our research to stay ahead of the next trends in Banking:
description: Business Insider is launching Banking coverage to help executives, channel strategists, marketers, and analysts stay ahead of complex industry shifts.
